comment._content: If you have any information regarding the individuals within the picture, please leave a comment.

comment.author: 62155395@N02
comment._content: I don't think the name of the company is "Tailor Made Clothing Factory" but rather the N. Snellenburg & Company factory in Philadelphia.  Conceivably, these workers could have taken the ferry from Camden, New Jersey, to Philly each day to work.
